definitions.definition: A unit of currency used in the Arab world, currently the name of the currency of Morocco and the United Arab Emirates .
Alternative form of dirhem : a former Turkish unit of weight .

main_definition: ( numismatics ) A unit of currency used in the Arab world, currently the name of the currency of Morocco and the United Arab Emirates .
secondary_definitions: ( historical units of measurement ) Alternative form of dirhem : a former Turkish unit of weight .
